about.description: I am a Fullstack Developer and QA with experience in different areas of technology, from building modern interfaces to automating tests to ensure quality and reliability in systems. I am constantly learning and generating real impact in each project.
about.goalsDescription: Consolidate my career by combining software development, code quality and automation of processes, contributing to solutions that generate value to the user and the business.

skills.title: Skills
skills.intro: here are some of my main skills and technologies I work with:

descriptions.html5: Semantic HTML structure and accessibility best practices.
descriptions.css3: Responsive layouts using modern CSS and Tailwind utilities.
descriptions.javascript: Modern JavaScript (ES6+) for interactive UIs and logic.
descriptions.angular: Angular components, services and reactive patterns.
descriptions.react: React with hooks, context and component patterns.
descriptions.nodejs: Node.js runtime, async patterns and package ecosystem.
descriptions.database: Relational DB design and query optimization (Postgres/MySQL).
descriptions.rest: REST API design, versioning and documentation.
descriptions.aws: AWS services and cloud architecture basics.
descriptions.junit: Unit testing and test structure with JUnit.
descriptions.vba: Automation and macros in Microsoft Office.
descriptions.python: Python scripting for automation and data tasks.
descriptions.powerbi: Data visualization and reports with Power BI.
descriptions.splunk: Log analysis and searching with Splunk.
